feed.title: FediFetcher Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for FediFetcher: v7.1.12
entry.content:
The headline new feature in v7.1.7 - 7.1.12 of FediFetcher is that we now support a custom instance blocklist. This is controlled through the instance-blocklist configuration option, which is an optional comma seperated list of instance domains that FediFetcher should never attempt to connect to.

Update instructions

For full instruction, please see the Updating FediFetcher documentation

Changelog

  • Add support for instance banlist by @bentasker in https://github.com/nanos/FediFetcher/pull/161
  • Use xxHash to hash robots cache file names for improved performance by @nanos in https://github.com/nanos/FediFetcher/pull/157
  • Update k8s example [#159] by @nanos in https://github.com/nanos/FediFetcher/pull/162
  • Update version string on tagged releases by @nanos in https://github.com/nanos/FediFetcher/pull/158
  • remove file accidentally committed in #140 by @nanos in https://github.com/nanos/FediFetcher/pull/165
  • Remove unused code, correct spelling by @AndrewKvalheim in https://github.com/nanos/FediFetcher/pull/164
  • updates github action to increment version by @bdmorin in https://github.com/nanos/FediFetcher/pull/166
  • Move docs to Wiki by @nanos in https://github.com/nanos/FediFetcher/pull/169

New Contributors

  • @bdmorin made their first contribution in https://github.com/nanos/FediFetcher/pull/166
  • @bentasker made their first contribution in https://github.com/nanos/FediFetcher/pull/161

Full Changelog: https://github.com/nanos/FediFetcher/compare/v7.1.6...v7.1.12

entry.title: New release for FediFetcher: v7.1.13
entry.content:
This is a minor update primarily to improve compatibility with GoToSocial, and make error messages easier to decipher for those who use FediFetcher with multiple Access Tokens.

Update instructions

For full instruction, please see the Updating FediFetcher documentation

What's Changed

  • Override the entrypoint so we can add a sleep delay before the next run. by @benyafai in https://github.com/nanos/FediFetcher/pull/182
  • Fix k8s example by @itspluxstahre in https://github.com/nanos/FediFetcher/pull/180
  • Include access token when fetching user followers/followings by @Sorixelle in https://github.com/nanos/FediFetcher/pull/183
  • Bump dawidd6/action-download-artifact from 3 to 6 in /.github/workflows by @dependabot in https://github.com/nanos/FediFetcher/pull/185
  • Identify a (masked) Access Token when an error occurs by @nanos in https://github.com/nanos/FediFetcher/pull/187

New Contributors

  • @itspluxstahre made their first contribution in https://github.com/nanos/FediFetcher/pull/180
  • @Sorixelle made their first contribution in https://github.com/nanos/FediFetcher/pull/183

Full Changelog: https://github.com/nanos/FediFetcher/compare/v7.1.12...v7.1.13

Full Changelog: https://github.com/nanos/FediFetcher/compare/v7.1.13...v7.1.14

entry.title: New release for FediFetcher: v7.1.15
entry.content:
What's Changed

New Contributors

entry.title: New release for FediFetcher: v7.1.16
entry.content:
This is an important release for those who are running FediFetcher as a GitHub Action.

If you are running FediFetcher as a GitHub Action please ensure you read #198 as this contains important additional information.

What's Changed

  • Parse Pleroma notice URIs by @nanos in https://github.com/nanos/FediFetcher/pull/197
  • Temporarily disable keepalive-workflow by @nanos in https://github.com/nanos/FediFetcher/pull/199

Full Changelog: https://github.com/nanos/FediFetcher/compare/v7.1.15...v7.1.16

Update instructions

For full instruction, please see the Updating FediFetcher documentation
